verses.kjv: My little children, these things write I unto you, that ye sin not. And if any man sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous:
verses.web: My little children, I write these things to you so that you may not sin. If anyone sins, we have a Counselor with the Father, Jesus Christ, the righteous.
verses.ct: My dear children, I'm writing this to you so that you won't sin. But if anyone does sin, we have someone who speaks to the Father in our defense — Jesus Christ, the righteous one.

verses.kjv: And he is the propitiation for our sins: and not for ours only, but also for the sins of the whole world.
verses.web: And he is the atoning sacrifice for our sins, and not for ours only, but also for the whole world.
verses.ct: He is the atoning sacrifice for our sins, and not just for ours, but for the sins of the whole world.

verses.kjv: And hereby we do know that we know him, if we keep his commandments.
verses.web: This is how we know that we know him: if we keep his commandments.
verses.ct: Here's how we can be sure we truly know God: by keeping his commandments.

verses.kjv: He that saith, I know him, and keepeth not his commandments, is a liar, and the truth is not in him.
verses.web: One who says, “I know him,” and doesn’t keep his commandments, is a liar, and the truth isn’t in him.
verses.ct: Anyone who says, "I know God," but doesn't keep his commandments is a liar. The truth isn't in that person.

verses.kjv: But whoso keepeth his word, in him verily is the love of God perfected: hereby know we that we are in him.
verses.web: But God’s love has most certainly been perfected in whoever keeps his word. This is how we know that we are in him:
verses.ct: But whoever obeys God's word — in that person, God's love has truly reached its fullest expression. This is how we know we belong to him:

verses.kjv: He that saith he abideth in him ought himself also so to walk, even as he walked.
verses.web: he who says he remains in him ought himself also to walk just like he walked.
verses.ct: anyone who claims to live in God must live the same way Jesus lived.

verses.kjv: Brethren, I write no new commandment unto you, but an old commandment which ye had from the beginning. The old commandment is the word which ye have heard from the beginning.
verses.web: Brothers, I write no new commandment to you, but an old commandment which you had from the beginning. The old commandment is the word which you heard from the beginning.
verses.ct: Brothers and sisters, I'm not writing you a new commandment. This is an old one — the same message you've had from the very beginning.

verses.kjv: Again, a new commandment I write unto you, which thing is true in him and in you: because the darkness is past, and the true light now shineth.
verses.web: Again, I write a new commandment to you, which is true in him and in you; because the darkness is passing away and the true light already shines.
verses.ct: Yet in another sense, I am writing you a new commandment, and its truth is revealed in both Christ and in you. The darkness is fading away, and the true light is already shining.

verses.kjv: He that saith he is in the light, and hateth his brother, is in darkness even until now.
verses.web: He who says he is in the light and hates his brother is in the darkness even until now.
verses.ct: Anyone who claims to be in the light but hates a fellow believer is still living in darkness.

verses.kjv: He that loveth his brother abideth in the light, and there is none occasion of stumbling in him.
verses.web: He who loves his brother remains in the light, and there is no occasion for stumbling in him.
verses.ct: Whoever loves their brother or sister lives in the light, and there's nothing in them that causes stumbling.

verses.kjv: But he that hateth his brother is in darkness, and walketh in darkness, and knoweth not whither he goeth, because that darkness hath blinded his eyes.
verses.web: But he who hates his brother is in the darkness, and walks in the darkness, and doesn’t know where he is going, because the darkness has blinded his eyes.
verses.ct: But whoever hates a brother or sister is wandering in darkness, not knowing where they're going, because the darkness has blinded their eyes.

verses.kjv: I write unto you, little children, because your sins are forgiven you for his name’s sake.
verses.web: I write to you, little children, because your sins are forgiven you for his name’s sake.
verses.ct: I'm writing to you, dear children, because your sins have been forgiven through the name of Jesus.

verses.kjv: I write unto you, fathers, because ye have known him that is from the beginning. I write unto you, young men, because ye have overcome the wicked one. I write unto you, little children, because ye have known the Father.
verses.web: I write to you, fathers, because you know him who is from the beginning. I write to you, young men, because you have overcome the evil one. I write to you, little children, because you know the Father.
verses.ct: I'm writing to you, fathers, because you know the one who has existed from the beginning. I'm writing to you, young people, because you have defeated the evil one. I'm writing to you, little children, because you know the Father.

verses.kjv: I have written unto you, fathers, because ye have known him that is from the beginning. I have written unto you, young men, because ye are strong, and the word of God abideth in you, and ye have overcome the wicked one.
verses.web: I have written to you, fathers, because you know him who is from the beginning. I have written to you, young men, because you are strong, and the word of God remains in you, and you have overcome the evil one.
verses.ct: I've written to you, fathers, because you know the one who has existed from the beginning. I've written to you, young people, because you are strong — God's word lives in you, and you have overcome the evil one.

verses.kjv: Love not the world, neither the things that are in the world. If any man love the world, the love of the Father is not in him.
verses.web: Don’t love the world or the things that are in the world. If anyone loves the world, the Father’s love isn’t in him.
verses.ct: Don't love the world or anything it offers. If anyone loves the world, the Father's love is not in them.

verses.kjv: For all that is in the world, the lust of the flesh, and the lust of the eyes, and the pride of life, is not of the Father, but is of the world.
verses.web: For all that is in the world, the lust of the flesh, the lust of the eyes, and the pride of life, isn’t the Father’s, but is the world’s.
verses.ct: Everything the world offers — the cravings of the body, the cravings of the eyes, and the arrogance that comes from wealth and status — none of it comes from the Father. It all comes from the world.

verses.kjv: And the world passeth away, and the lust thereof: but he that doeth the will of God abideth for ever.
verses.web: The world is passing away with its lusts, but he who does God’s will remains forever.
verses.ct: The world and its cravings are passing away, but whoever does God's will lives forever.

verses.kjv: Little children, it is the last time: and as ye have heard that antichrist shall come, even now are there many antichrists; whereby we know that it is the last time.
verses.web: Little children, these are the end times, and as you heard that the Antichrist is coming, even now many antichrists have arisen. By this we know that it is the final hour.
verses.ct: Dear children, this is the final hour. You've heard that the Antichrist is coming, and already many antichrists have appeared. That's how we know the end is near.

verses.kjv: They went out from us, but they were not of us; for if they had been of us, they would no doubt have continued with us: but they went out, that they might be made manifest that they were not all of us.
verses.web: They went out from us, but they didn’t belong to us; for if they had belonged to us, they would have continued with us. But they left, that they might be revealed that none of them belong to us.
verses.ct: They left our community, but they never truly belonged to us. If they had, they would have stayed. Their departure made it clear that none of them were really one of us.

verses.kjv: But ye have an unction from the Holy One, and ye know all things.
verses.web: You have an anointing from the Holy One, and you all have knowledge.
verses.ct: But you have an anointing from the Holy One, and you all have knowledge of the truth.

verses.kjv: I have not written unto you because ye know not the truth, but because ye know it, and that no lie is of the truth.
verses.web: I have not written to you because you don’t know the truth, but because you know it, and because no lie is of the truth.
verses.ct: I'm not writing to you because you don't know the truth. I'm writing because you do know it, and because no lie has anything to do with the truth.

verses.kjv: Who is a liar but he that denieth that Jesus is the Christ? He is antichrist, that denieth the Father and the Son.
verses.web: Who is the liar but he who denies that Jesus is the Christ? This is the Antichrist, he who denies the Father and the Son.
verses.ct: Who is the liar? It's the person who denies that Jesus is the Christ. That person is the Antichrist — denying both the Father and the Son.

verses.kjv: Whosoever denieth the Son, the same hath not the Father: he that acknowledgeth the Son hath the Father also.
verses.web: Whoever denies the Son doesn’t have the Father. He who confesses the Son has the Father also.
verses.ct: Anyone who denies the Son doesn't have the Father either. But whoever acknowledges the Son has the Father as well.

verses.kjv: Let that therefore abide in you, which ye have heard from the beginning. If that which ye have heard from the beginning shall remain in you, ye also shall continue in the Son, and in the Father.
verses.web: Therefore, as for you, let that remain in you which you heard from the beginning. If that which you heard from the beginning remains in you, you also will remain in the Son, and in the Father.
verses.ct: So hold on to the message you heard from the beginning. If what you heard from the start stays rooted in you, then you will remain in the Son and in the Father.

verses.kjv: And this is the promise that he hath promised us, even eternal life.
verses.web: This is the promise which he promised us, the eternal life.
verses.ct: And this is what he promised us: eternal life.

verses.kjv: These things have I written unto you concerning them that seduce you.
verses.web: These things I have written to you concerning those who would lead you astray.
verses.ct: I've written these things to warn you about those who are trying to lead you astray.

verses.kjv: But the anointing which ye have received of him abideth in you, and ye need not that any man teach you: but as the same anointing teacheth you of all things, and is truth, and is no lie, and even as it hath taught you, ye shall abide in him.
verses.web: As for you, the anointing which you received from him remains in you, and you don’t need for anyone to teach you. But as his anointing teaches you concerning all things, and is true, and is no lie, and even as it taught you, you will remain in him.
verses.ct: As for you, the anointing you received from him remains in you, and you don't need anyone else to teach you. His anointing teaches you about everything — and it is true, not false. So just as it has taught you, remain in him.

verses.kjv: And now, little children, abide in him; that, when he shall appear, we may have confidence, and not be ashamed before him at his coming.
verses.web: Now, little children, remain in him, that when he appears, we may have boldness, and not be ashamed before him at his coming.
verses.ct: So now, dear children, remain in him. Then when he appears, we can stand before him with confidence and not shrink back in shame at his coming.

verses.kjv: If ye know that he is righteous, ye know that every one that doeth righteousness is born of him.
verses.web: If you know that he is righteous, you know that everyone who practices righteousness has been born of him.
verses.ct: Since you know that God is righteous, you can be sure that everyone who lives righteously has been born of him.
